title: Big Al's Island Grill
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, Pizza, Beer/Wine, Caribbean, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. 1950s diner style restaurant connected to a bike shop inside. Offers primarily burgers but does have a small menu section called "vegan veggie." There is a wrap called the "big skinny" which comes with sliced tofu, grilled zucchini and onion, avocado and pumpkin seeds - ask to omit the mozzarella.  Another example is "Jimmy the Greek" salad or wrap which comes with chickpeas, red onion, kalamata olives, croutons, cucumbers, sundried tomatoes in Greek vinaigrette - ask to omit chicken and feta. Sides include shoestring fries, krinkle cut fries, sweet potato fries, side salad. Additionally there is a veggie burger but you should ask if it's vegan or not. Booth and bar seating.
streetAddress: The Salt Mills Plaza, Grace Bay Rd
